Pérez Navarro López is a 69 year old retired Partner from Spain.
In 1979, Pérez Navarro López started working as a Analyst at KKR Iberia Asesoramiento S.A., marking the beginning of his successful career.
At KKR Iberia Asesoramiento S.A., he held the position of Associate from 1982 to 1984, making significant contributions to the organization.
His tenure as a Investment Director at ProA Capital de Inversión SGEIC S.A. from 1984 to 1986 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
He appointment as a Partner at ProA Capital de Inversión SGEIC S.A. in 1986 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
